titles.title: Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
Making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-213, by Mr. Fleischmann.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 173.
